person.persName: Leonard A. Spalding (Marion Co., KY, politician and retired merchant)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Lancaster Spalding in Washington County in November 1830. Father of John L. Spalding. Married to Elizabeth M. Shadburne Spalding. Father of Martin J. Spalding, Mary P. Spalding, William R. Spalding, and Elizabeth Spalding. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Marion County in 1837. Engaged in commerce in Marion County in 1840. Farmer and merchant in Marion County in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Marion County in 1850. Employed Frederick Merimee as a merchant in 1850. Merchant in Marion County in 1860. Owned sixteen enslaved persons in Marion County in 1860.
